member.name: T:WetBase.DAL.IGetAll`1
member.summary: An interface for retreiving all objects, subject to filtering via the provided function.
member.typeparam: The type of object to retrieve.

member.name: M:WetBase.DAL.IGetAll`1.GetAll(System.Func{System.Linq.IQueryable{`0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0}})
member.summary: A method to retrieve all objects from the persistence layer, subject to filtering via the filter function.
member.remarks: The filter function changes the return type from IQueryable to IEnumerable so that it can perofmr filtering on the server.
member.param: A function which can perform filtering.
